name: Blood Tender
description:
Deckard and Jessica must save their son from the energy vampires, that have kidnapped him. Play through as Jessica. A mother, a wife and a vampire with a mother's wrath. 

            I want to expand the game and story and have a play through as Deckard, as well, but we will see. Overall this is a very fun vampire game, with a good story, and some force push and pull abilities to play with. Thanks for checking it out and let me know in the comments if your are interested in wanting a full game or more to it.
